mapper.sql: SELECT EVT_IDX, EVT_NM,ST_DATE,END_DATE,EVT_ST,EVT_FILE_URL,EVT_TRG,EVT_PHONE,EVT_TRG_DATE, EVT_CTG_ID, EVT_CTG_NM FROM EVT_EVT LEFT JOIN EVT_CTG ON EVT_EVT.EVT_CTG_ID = EVT_CTG.EVT_CTG_IDX where END_DATE < DATE(NOW()) AND EVT_TRG_DATE != '9999-12-31' ORDER BY EVT_TRG_DATE DESC LIMIT 10 offset #{pageIdx}
mapper.select: SELECT EVT_IDX, EVT_NM,ST_DATE,END_DATE,EVT_ST,EVT_FILE_URL,EVT_TRG,EVT_PHONE,EVT_TRG_DATE, EVT_CTG_ID, EVT_CTG_NM FROM EVT_EVT LEFT JOIN EVT_CTG ON EVT_EVT.EVT_CTG_ID = EVT_CTG.EVT_CTG_IDX where END_DATE < DATE(NOW()) AND EVT_EVT.EVT_CTG_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchOption},'%') AND UPPER(EVT_EVT.EVT_NM) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')) LIMIT 10 offset #{pageIdx}
